txt.en: 'You should leave the hunting to those with knowledge of the wood.'
'Most of the folk here are a good sort, even if they tend to spin a tall tale now and again.'
'We trade all of our goods out of Celondim. The port down the road is closer, but the dwarves that run it are a bunch of toughs!'
'Don't listen to this old fool...that bear gets bigger every time he tells that story.'
